value:
I advise you not to get close to the
Heroes. It will just make it harder...
should you ever be parted.

Some of our kingdom's subjects
objected when I joined this order.
But I wanted to do my part.$k$pStill, there are others who say that I
don't behave quite like a prince
ought to anyway.

I'll be glad to go on patrol with you.
Some get lost around here. So, really,
it's best I keep an eye on you.

Someday we should visit the library
together. There's much information
on the Heroes of other worlds.

I was just tending to my sword. Don't
you find it a fine blade? The stones in
the hilt—they burn like white flames.

You must be a good friend of
$Nf, yes?$k$pHmm. An alternate version of my
Askran Kingdom. Is there
another one of me here?

All of this is thanks to you,
$Nu.

I have gained the strength I
require to battle on!

A humble gain. Perhaps I'll do
better next time.

I deeply appreciate your help,
Summoner.

I have to confess that I never
intended to become friends with
you, Summoner.$k$pBut you're always there when I need
you, to the extent that when you're
not near, I feel...not quite myself.$k$pIt's a delicate position to be in.
The more you have to lose, the
worse it hurts when you do.$k$pOthers may open themselves to
such hurt, but as a prince,
I must remain strong.$k$pIt seemed reasonable to keep
everyone at a distance. But you've
shown me the folly of that.$k$pI would have never discovered
our fine friendship, had I not
welcomed you in.$k$pAnd then what would I be?
Less than I am. Now, I can only
hope you feel the same.$k$pIn any case, I swear to keep you
safe. You're my trusted partner,
$Nu.
How about you and I have a little chat?
We are fortunate to have you with us. I can't imagine a better summoner.
My greatest wish is to see our realm at peace. And our people, happy again.
I find it best not to get too attached these days...especially to Heroes.
Promise you'll never leave us...without warning me first.
I am striving to be an excellent prince—and to master the use of Heroes.
I'm glad to have you here. But someday, I'd like to open the way to your world. We could go there together.
Shadow Dragon and the Blade of Light
Keep the weapon triangle in mind.
To use a unit's Assist Skill, move the unit onto another one.
